alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 3:25PM CDT until August 11 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Bullock County in southeastern Alabama... Barbour County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spring Hill, or near Midway, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eufaula, Midway, Clayton, Hawkinsville, Spring Hill, Gaino, Comer, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Osco, Texasville, Richards Crossroads, White Oak, Lakepoint Resort State Park, Millers Ford, Batesville, Clayton Municipal Airport, Twin Springs, Lugo, Baker Hill and Three Notch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
